description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for the Recommendation Service providing RED metrics (Rate, Errors, Duration), API endpoint analysis, resource utilization, logs, and traces for complete observability.

panels.description: Current request rate (requests per second) for the recommendation service. Shows the volume of incoming requests over time.
panels.title: RPS

panels.description: Percentage of requests resulting in errors for the recommendation service.
panels.title: API Error Percentage

panels.description: 95th percentile response time in milliseconds. This represents the latency experienced by the slowest 5% of requests.
panels.title: Response Time (p95)

panels.description: Cache hit ratio trends of the in-memory cache that recommendation service uses. Each data point shows the cache hit ratio calculated over a 2-minute window, averaged across all pods.
panels.title: Cache Hit Ratio

panels.description: Total number of container restarts for the recommendation service. Restarts indicate pod crashes, OOM kills, or health check failures.
panels.title: Container Restarts

panels.description: Request rate per second for each API endpoint showing traffic distribution across different endpoints.
panels.title: RPS by API Endpoint

panels.description: API error percentage for each endpoint. Identifies which specific endpoints are experiencing issues or failures.
panels.title: API Error Percentage by Endpoint

panels.description: 50th and 95th percentile response times for each API endpoint. Shows both typical and worst-case performance per endpoint.
panels.title: Latency by API Endpoint (p50/p95)

panels.description: Tabular summary of key metrics (RPS, API Error %, p95 Latency) for each API endpoint, sorted by request volume.
panels.title: API Endpoint Summary Table

panels.description: Top 7 operations with the highest average response time showing the slowest operations in the recommendation service.
panels.title: Top 7 Slowest Operations (Mean Latency)

panels.description: Log volume breakdown by severity level showing distribution of INFO, WARN, ERROR, and other log levels. Helps identify error patterns and application health trends through log analysis.
panels.title: Log Records by Severity

panels.description: Recent log entries from the recommendation service, including severity levels, trace/span IDs for correlation, and pod information. Use trace IDs to correlate with distributed traces.
panels.title: Recommendation Service Logs (100 recent entries)

panels.description: Distributed traces with the longest execution times, helping identify performance bottlenecks in request processing across service boundaries.
panels.title: Top Slow Traces

panels.description: Breakdown of service operations by request volume, showing the relative usage of different recommendation service functions and dependencies.
panels.title: Service Dependencies

panels.description: Average CPU usage percentage relative to CPU limits across all recommendation service pods. Shows actual CPU consumption as a percentage of the maximum allowed CPU (limit) averaged across all pods.
panels.title: CPU Usage (%) w.r.t Limit

panels.description: Average CPU requests and limits across all recommendation service pods in millicores. Requests show the guaranteed CPU allocation (what Kubernetes reserves), while limits show the maximum CPU allowed (what pods can burst to). This aggregated view helps understand overall resource allocation patterns.
panels.title: CPU Limits and Requests (Average/Pod) - Millicores

panels.description: Average memory usage percentage relative to memory limits across all recommendation service pods. Shows actual memory consumption as a percentage of the maximum allowed memory (limit) averaged across all pods.
panels.title: Memory Usage (%) w.r.t Limit

panels.description: Average memory requests and limits across all recommendation service pods in MiB. Requests show the guaranteed memory allocation (what Kubernetes reserves), while limits show the maximum memory allowed (what pods can use before being OOM killed). This aggregated view helps understand overall memory allocation patterns.
panels.title: Memory Limits and Requests (Average/Pod) - MiB

title: Recommendation Service Dashboard
